info.name: Monochrome Dark Jira
info.additionalInfo:
March 23, 2018
---------------------
- Make sure not to set progressbar and certain button backgrounds
- Improve highlighting for currently active Activity tab in issue view
- Improve visibility of the Releases filter buttons
- Improve activity stream configuration styling
- Improve confluence icon for mentioned tasks list

March 16, 2018
---------------------
- Resolve issues with some buttons
- Use slightly grey for font, instead of pure white
- Resolve issue with some icons being their original dark blue

March 2, 2018
---------------------
- Make links blue again
- Remove gradient from attachment delete button
- Fix Jira issue macro border
- Make buttons visible
- Fix/support activity stream

Feb 16, 2018
---------------------
- No longer apply styling to Confluence or other Atlassian pages
